data.rubric: A solar system is made up of a large star and all the planets that orbit that star.
Click on the solar system to see it in movement.
There are many solar systems in the universe.
The universe is the whole of space and everything in it.
In our solar system, the star that the Earth orbits is called the Sun.
Click on the Earth to know more about it.
data.Caption: The Earth takes one year to travel all the way around the Sun.
The Moon orbits the Earth.
one year
